message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity that I believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $100 for it. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to your response.

Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer you've made. However, considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $90 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your decision. In light of this, I am willing to consider a price of $95 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions. I look forward to your thoughts on this proposal.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget, I would like to propose a price of $90 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise and I hope it works for you as well.
